channel.title: "The Pants" - things not to do
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread ""The Pants" - things not to do"

item.title: Re: "The Pants" - things not to do
item.content:encoded: The reason it's only the 20d/20s and the Doughman hangout for Legacy after they baw is because Doughman Lvl. 2 doesn't teach This Hand of Mine. Thus it would be impossible to complete the mission. Because of this, after bawing, Legacy are just like everyone else, so they can complete the mission.

item.title: Re: "The Pants" - things not to do
item.content:encoded:
Doughman Lvl 2, who you get from completing The Land of Baw, doesn't teach This Hand of Mine.

Because of that, Legacy nin who go the Baw route have the Hangout Requirement and the 20d20s fight that everybody else does, whether they go Pants or Pantsless.

item.title: Re: "The Pants" - things not to do
item.content:encoded: OK, after trying it, and contrary to The Pants, Legacy is still a 20d20s fight. It seems odd that it's a non-Reaper mission…

item.title: Re: "The Pants" - things not to do
item.content:encoded: But the Legacy Pants fight is 40d40s with an auto-success jutsu you can only learn from Doughman, isn't it?

item.title: Re: "The Pants" - things not to do
item.content:encoded: Actually, it doesn't matter. If you baw as legacy, you need to hang out with Doughman for Pant or Pantless.

item.title: "The Pants" - things not to do
item.content:encoded: If you want to do this mission as Legacy, it's worth remembering that you need Doughman's jutsu … I just figured that out a bit too late, and bypassed Arena fights with the Land of Baw, so I'm stuck doing "The Pantsless" instead, though Strawberry3 is more useful to me.
